text: Paulina F. Chávez (born May 22, 2002) is an American actress. She is known for her roles as Ashley Garcia in the Netflix series The Expanding Universe of Ashley Garcia (2020) and as Flora in the second season of the Netflix series Fate: The Winx Saga (2022). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from El Paso, Texas Category:Actors from San Antonio, Texas Category:American child actors
title: Paulina Chávez
